description: React component 'ProblemInput' that provides a user interface for inputting problems related to calculus (derivatives, integrals, limits), with form validation and interaction with an external solver utility.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates user inputs for the calculus problem, checking for empty expressions, valid variable, and correct derivative order.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, performs validation, calls the external solver function, and manages loading/error states.
